sentences.english: The plan does, however, depend on American taxpayers stumping up huge amounts of money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這項計劃需要依靠納稅人的錢來保證所需巨資。

sentences.english: Obama wants to spend big bucks fixing things like railways and bridges.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統打算在鐵路橋樑這些建設上花費巨資。

sentences.english: She was a devout Buddhist , and spent money lavishly on the construction of temples.
sentences.chinese: 同時她也是一位虔誠的佛教徒，耗費巨資修建寺院。

sentences.english: China to pour more cash into overseas iron ore.
sentences.chinese: 中國擬投巨資海外開採鐵礦石打破三巨頭壟斷。

sentences.english: S. invested a huge sum of money in building its new embassy in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 美國政府投巨資建造了新的北京大使館。

sentences.english: Microsoft would also avoid hefty manufacturing and marketing costs.
sentences.chinese: 微軟也不會在生產和營銷上斥巨資。

sentences.english: Mr Suwaidi, by contrast, invested heavily in such facilities.
sentences.chinese: 相反，蘇瓦伊迪卻在這些設備上投入巨資。

sentences.english: But huge amounts of money invested so far, is still a "uncompleted" works.
sentences.chinese: 但巨資投入至今，依然是個“半拉子”工程。

sentences.english: Many countries spent billons of dollars on environment protection every year.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家每年花費巨資對環境污染進行監測和治理。

sentences.english: In the United States, the federal government and companies have spent heavily on pebble-bed research.
sentences.chinese: 美國的聯邦政府和相關公司爲球牀的研究投入了巨資。

sentences.english: Max invested heavily in energy stocks.
sentences.chinese: 麥斯在能源股裏投下巨資。

sentences.english: He spared no expense when he constructed the buildings of the Acropolis.
sentences.chinese: 他不惜成本，斥下巨資製作阿克羅波利斯。

sentences.english: If you say so. Have you noticed that China seems to beinvesting a lot in its housing market recently?
sentences.chinese: 不過，你有注意到中國最近在向房地產市場投巨資麼？

definition: Zixing county level city in Chenzhou 郴州[Chen1 zhou1], Hunan
variant of 巨額|巨额[ju4 e2]
to incite trouble/to stir up havoc
to raise a loan/to borrow money
to lobby/to campaign/to promote (an idea, a product)/(old) to visit various rulers and promote one's political ideas (in the Warring States period)
to carry out large scale construction
